pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)2 Pink Wool, 1 Mushroom Spores, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 75 Sun value.

pages.title: Stallers
pages.text: $(#25228d)Beauty-shrooms stuns Zombies and sometimes bring them to your side.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. Magic Damage. Stuns Zombies for 5 seconds. 12.5% chance to Hypnotize.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)"Lip Gloss. Check. Eyeliners. Check. Metformin. Check. My beauty is too sweet even for me."
